@CraigBennett3 @BenGoldsmith @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WildlifeTrusts Someone needs to inform the Wye and Usk Foundation. They have made huge efforts to improve the environment on the Lugg. This is insane vandalism and this landowner needs punishing and should be forced to make amends. The soil run off alone will ruin the gravel spawning redds.
